# Podcasting

## Quick Start

This skill helps you launch and grow a podcast. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Launching a Podcast

- [ ] Define podcast concept (topic, format, audience)
- [ ] Choose format (solo, interview, co-hosted, narrative)
- [ ] Set up equipment (mic, software, hosting)
- [ ] Create intro/outro music
- [ ] Record pilot episodes (3-5)
- [ ] Edit and produce
- [ ] Publish to platforms (Apple, Spotify, YouTube)
- [ ] Create show notes with timestamps
- [ ] Promote each episode
- [ ] Track downloads and engagement

## Key Frameworks

- **Episode Length**: 20-40 min (commute-friendly)
- **Publishing Cadence**: Weekly (consistency matters)
- **Episode Structure**: Intro (1 min) → Content (20-30 min) → CTA (2 min)
- **Promotion**: Email list + Social + Guest networks

## Quick Wins

- Batch record 4-5 episodes at once
- Invite guests with audiences (cross-promotion)
- Repurpose into blog posts (SEO traffic)
- Use timestamps in show notes (YouTube SEO)
